fee.label: Price
fee.description: pp - ok to pay at door.

item.description:
You are welcome to come last minute! You can pay at the door. Hope to see you! Trish

 

Hi everyone,

The house dance parties have been a big hit and we will definitely be having more with our great DJ Alkemi!!  We also thought it would be fun to try something different with more focus on talking and getting to know each other.

So let’s have an evening BBQ and house party with great food and conversation.  We might even break out a fun party game or two.  My fiancé Nick is a professional chef and will be providing all of the yummy food!

All you need to bring is your own beer/wine….we will provide all the rest!!

Because there are 11 different meetup groups being invited it’s a really unique opportunity to interact with a wide variety of people. You never know what networking opportunities, friendships or romantic encounters might happen!  I love the community that is developing and all the interesting connections that are being made!

If you are romantically available, it is a great chance to meet a new sweetie!  Simply wear a sticker on your badge to show you are interested in connecting.

Requested Contribution: $15 prepaid online by May 17th, $20 at door.

ALL FOOD INCLUDED!!! (No need to bring anything for food):  A yummy selection of grilled meats, seafood and vegetables as well as salads, sides and desserts will be served. Gluten, dairy Free as well as vegans will be accommodated.  Non-alcoholic beverages will also be included.

BYOB – We will be providing non-alcohol beverages but if you would like to enjoy some libation, please bring your own beer and wine. (You need to be 21+ of course).

When: Saturday, May 18th
Time: 7pm to  Midnight
Where: Trish’s House, 29 Elm Street, Somerville, MA

All ages welcome! Bring your friends and significant others!

For questions email Trish at blain.trish@gmail.com or call 413-320-3991.

Hope you can make it!

Trish
item.name: Multi-Meetup BBQ and House Party!
